properties.Name: CustomerRelationshipType
properties.Description:
The  type or nature of relationship between two customers.

Ex:
- Subsidiary / Parent
- Related Through Parent Company
- Replaced By
- Competitor

Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: CustomerRelationshipTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Customer Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: CustomerRelationshipTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Customer Relationship Type.
